com.nutiteq.styles

Class PointStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.styles.Style
      • com.nutiteq.styles.PointStyle

  • public class PointStyle
extends Style
    A style for points. Contains attributes for configuring how the point is drawn on the screen.

        public PointStyle(long cPtr,

      • PointStyle

        public PointStyle(Color color,
          Bitmap bitmap,
          float clickSize,
          float size)
        Constructs a PointStyle object from various parameters. Instantiating the object directly is
        not recommended, PointStyleBuilder should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        color - The color for the point.
        bitmap - The bitmap for the point.
        clickSize - The size of the point used for click detection.
        size - The size for the point.
